 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָזַז‎</span>] **verb** ==be strong== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Hiph\`il, especially in bad sense, and especially derivatives <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַז‎</span>; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עז‎</span> ***strength***, also in proper name [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>338</sup>; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be mighty, strong***, compare Old Aramaic, Nabataean, Palmyrene proper name <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עזיזו‎</span> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>338</sup> [[BDB#Cook|Cook]]<sup>90</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be mighty, strong***, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ezêzu***</u></abbr>, ***be furious***, ***ezzu***, ***fierce***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָעֹז‎</span> [[Ps.9.20|Ps 9:20]]; [[Ps.52.9|Ps 52:9]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָעוֺז‎</span> [[Dan.11.12|Dan 11:12]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּעֹז‎</span> [[Ps.89.14|Ps 89:14]]; [[Eccl.7.19|Eccl 7:19]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתָּ֫עָז‎</span> [[Judg.3.10|Judg 3:10]]; [[Judg.6.2|Judg 6:2]] ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּזָּה‎</span> [[Ps.68.29|Ps 68:29]] (but see below); ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲזוֺז‎</span> [[Prov.8.28|Prov 8:28]] — ***be strong, prevail***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתָּ֫עָז יָדוֺ עַלֿ‎</span> [[Judg.3.10|Judg 3:10]] ***and his hand prevailed against***, so [[Judg.6.2|Judg 6:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלתָּֿעֹז אֱנוֺשׁ‎</span> [[Ps.9.20|Ps 9:20]]; [[Dan.11.12|Dan 11:12]] absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּעֹז יָָֽדְךָ‎</span> [[Ps.89.14|Ps 89:14]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>); of apparently strength of wicked [[Ps.52.9|Ps 52:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּעֲזוֺז עִינוֺת תְּהוֺם‎</span> [[Prov.8.28|Prov 8:28]] ***when the fountains of the deep grew strong***, i.e. firm, fixed; but [[BDB#Oort|Oort]] [[BDB#Bi|Bi]] Toy read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעַזְּזוֺ‎</span> ***when he made firm, fixed fast*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּאַמְּצוֺ‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּוָּה אֱלֹהִים‎</span> [[Ps.68.29|Ps 68:29]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] and others ***shew thyself strong, O God***, who, etc., compare [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 363</sup>; &lt; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺז הָא‎</span> ***the might, O God***, which, etc., [[BDB#Hup|Hup]] [[BDB#Du|Du]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַחָכְמָה תָּעֹז לֶחָכָם‎</span> [[Eccl.7.19|Eccl 7:19]] ***wisdom is strong for the wise.*** — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָעוֺז‎</span> [[Isa.30.2|Isa 30:2]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּז‎</span>. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵעֵז אִישׁ רָשָׁע בְּפָנָיו‎</span> [[Prov.21.29|Prov 21:29]] ***a wicked man maketh firm*** (***sheweth boldness***) ***with his face***; so 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵעֵ֫זָה פָנֶיהָ‎</span> [[Prov.7.13|Prov 7:13]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67dd»§ 67dd</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 372</sup>) ***she maketh bold her face***.
